trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gir dataene for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> class when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> is drawn and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw?displayProperty=fullName>denne hendelsen oppstår ved den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>klasse når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>tegnes og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapsverdi `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The handler for this event receives a parameter of type DrawToolTipEventArgs.
trans-unit.target: Et behandlingsprogram for denne hendelsen mottar en parameter av typen DrawToolTipEventArgs.

trans-unit.source: The DrawToolTipEventArgs class contains all the information needed to paint the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>, including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> text, the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>, and the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object on which the drawing should be done.
trans-unit.target: Klassen DrawToolTipEventArgs inneholder all informasjonen som kreves for å fargemerknader i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>, inkludert den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>teksten, den <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>, og <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objekt i tegning skal utføres.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: To customize the look of the ToolTip, use the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> to determine the bounds of the ToolTip, and the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to perform your customized drawing.
trans-unit.target: Du kan tilpasse utseendet til verktøytipset ved bruk av <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>til å bestemme grensene for verktøytips, og <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objektet til å utføre den egendefinerte tegningen.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>

trans-unit.source: You can increase the bounds of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> before it is shown by handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Popup> event.
trans-unit.target: Du kan øke grensene for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>før den vises ved behandling av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Popup>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Popup> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: DrawToolTipEventArgs also supports partial customization through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawText%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBorder%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: DrawToolTipEventArgs støtter også delvis tilpassing ved hjelp av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawText%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBorder%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBorder%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A>

trans-unit.source: Using these methods, you can owner draw portions of the ToolTip while leaving the other portions drawn in the standard way.
trans-unit.target: Ved hjelp av disse metodene, kan du eier draw deler av verktøytipset mens de andre delene tegnes på standard måte.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The DrawToolTipEventArgs constructor uses the `graphics`, `associatedControl`, `associatedWindow`, `bounds`, `font` and `toolTipText` parameters to initialize their corresponding, similarly named properties.
trans-unit.target: Konstruktøren DrawToolTipEventArgs bruker den `graphics`, `associatedControl`, `associatedWindow`, `bounds`, `font` og `toolTipText` parametere ikke tilhørende, på samme måte navngitte egenskaper.

trans-unit.source: The `backColor` and `foreColor` parameters are used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawText%2A> methods, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Den `backColor` og `foreColor` parametere som brukes av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawText%2A>metoder, henholdsvis.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> context used to draw the ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> konteksten brukes til å tegne verktøytipset.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window"></xref> that the ToolTip is bound to.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window"> </xref> som verktøytipset er bundet til.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> that the ToolTip is being created for.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> verktøytipset opprettes for.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that outlines the area where the ToolTip is to be displayed.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som gir en oversikt over området der er verktøytipset som skal vises.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the text for the ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.String>som inneholder teksten for verktøytipset.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> of the ToolTip background.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> bakgrunnens verktøytips.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> of the ToolTip text.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> for teksten for verktøytipset.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> used to draw the ToolTip text.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> brukes til å tegne teksten for verktøytipset.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control for which the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref> is being drawn.
trans-unit.target: Henter kontrollen som den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"> </xref> det tegnes.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> can be associated with multiple controls through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.SetToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, the AssociatedControl property can be used to determine which control the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw> event is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Fordi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>kan knyttes til flere kontroller via den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.SetToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden, AssociatedControl kan brukes til å finne ut hvilken kontroll av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw>hendelsen er knyttet til.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.SetToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: This is helpful if you want to perform different ToolTip customization based on the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Dette er nyttig hvis du vil utføre ulike verktøytips tilpassing basert på den tilknyttede kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref> when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw"></xref> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> som er knyttet til den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"> </xref> når den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw"> </xref> inntreffer.

trans-unit.source: The return value will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the ToolTip is not associated with a control.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som returneres blir <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> hvis verktøytipset ikke er knyttet til en kontroll.

trans-unit.source: Gets the window to which this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref> is bound.
trans-unit.target: Henter vinduet som denne <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"> </xref> er bundet.

trans-unit.source: When a window is owned by another window, the owned window is minimized and closed with the owner window.
trans-unit.target: Når et vindu eies av en annen vinduet, er vinduet EIDE minimert og lukket med eiervinduet.

trans-unit.source: Owned windows are also never displayed behind their owner form.
trans-unit.target: EIDE windows vises aldri bak skjemaet eier.

trans-unit.source: Here the ToolTip is owned by the native Win32 window represented by the AssociatedWindow property.
trans-unit.target: Her eies verktøytipset av opprinnelig Win32 vinduet representert av egenskapen AssociatedWindow.

trans-unit.source: The window which owns the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Vinduet som eier den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the size and location of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Henter størrelsen og plasseringen av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"> </xref> til å tegne.

trans-unit.source: By default, the bounds are set by the operating system based on system settings and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> text.
trans-unit.target: Som standard grensene er angitt av operativsystemet basert på systeminnstillinger og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>tekst.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: You can increase the bounds of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> before it is shown by handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Popup><xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Popup> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> class.
trans-unit.target: Du kan øke grensene for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>før den vises ved å behandle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Popup><xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Popup>hendelsen for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>klasse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Popup></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Popup> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the bounds of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som representerer grensene for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"> </xref> til å tegne.

trans-unit.source: Draws the background of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref> using the system background color.
trans-unit.target: Tegner bakgrunn for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"> </xref> med bakgrunnsfargen for systemet.

trans-unit.source: Use this method when you want to customize certain visual aspects of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>, but want a standard ToolTip background drawn for you using the current value of <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Info%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne metoden hvis du vil tilpasse visual deler av det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>, men vil et standard Verktøytipsbakgrunn ved hjelp av gjeldende verdi for <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Info%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Info%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: The background is drawn to fill the area specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.Bounds%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Bakgrunnen tegnes for å fylle området som er angitt av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.Bounds%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.Bounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: Draws the border of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref> using the system border color.
trans-unit.target: Tegner kantlinjen på den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"> </xref> bruker kantlinjefargen system.

trans-unit.source: Use this method when you want to customize certain visual aspects of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>, but want a standard ToolTip border drawn for you using the current value of <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.WindowFrame%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne metoden hvis du vil tilpasse deler visual av en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>, men vil ha en standard verktøytips kantlinje ved hjelp av gjeldende verdi for <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.WindowFrame%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.WindowFrame%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: The border is drawn to the size specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.Bounds%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Kantlinjen tegnes størrelsen som er angitt av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.Bounds%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.Bounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can increase the bounds of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> before it is shown by handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Popup> event.
trans-unit.target: Du kan øke grensene for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>før den vises ved behandling av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Popup>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Popup> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: Draws the text of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref> using the system text color and font.
trans-unit.target: Tegner teksten i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"> </xref> ved hjelp av systemet tekstfargen og skriften.

trans-unit.source: The DrawText method represents the default method of displaying a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>.
trans-unit.target: Metoden DrawText representerer standardmetoden for visning av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: This method uses the system specified font and the current value of <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.InfoText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> for the font color.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden bruker systemet angitt skrift samt gjeldende verdi for <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.InfoText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>for skriftfargen.</xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.InfoText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The text is drawn as a single line centered horizontally and vertically within the rectangle specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.Bounds%2A> property; it is equivalent to the following call to the overloaded version of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawText%28System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags%29>: `DrawText(TextFormatFlags.HorizontalCenter | TextFormatFlags.VerticalCenter | TextFormatFlags.SingleLine | TextFormatFlags.HidePrefix)`
trans-unit.target: Teksten er tegnet som en enkelt linje midtstilt vannrett eller loddrett i rektangelet angitt av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.Bounds%2A>egenskapen; tilsvarer det følgende kall til overbelastet versjonen av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawText%28System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags%29>: `DrawText(TextFormatFlags.HorizontalCenter | TextFormatFlags.VerticalCenter | TextFormatFlags.SingleLine | TextFormatFlags.HidePrefix)` </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawText%28System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags%29> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.Bounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: Draws the text of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref> using the system text color and font, and the specified text layout.
trans-unit.target: Tegner teksten i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"> </xref> ved hjelp av systemet tekstfargen og skrift og oppsettet angitte teksten.

trans-unit.source: The DrawText method is used to customize certain visual aspects of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>, including the layout of the ToolTip text.
trans-unit.target: Metoden DrawText brukes til å tilpasse enkelte visual delene av et <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>, inkludert oppsettet for teksten for verktøytipset.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: This method uses the system specified font and the current value of <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.InfoText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> for the font color.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden bruker systemet angitt skrift samt gjeldende verdi for <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.InfoText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>for skriftfargen.</xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.InfoText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"></xref> containing a bitwise combination of values that specifies the display and layout for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.ToolTipText*>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"> </xref> som inneholder en bitvis kombinasjon av verdier som angir visningen og oppsettet for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.ToolTipText*>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.ToolTipText*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the font used to draw the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter skriften som brukes til å tegne den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the Font property when you are custom drawing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> that should use the Windows default font.
trans-unit.target: Bruke egenskapen skrift når du er egendefinerte tegning en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>som skal bruke standardskrift for Windows.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Gets the graphics surface used to draw the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter grafikk overflaten brukes til å tegne den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: You use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to customize the drawing of certain visual aspects of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>.
trans-unit.target: Du bruker <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objektet til å tilpasse tegning av deler visual av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can draw your own ToolTip background by using the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.FillRectangle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel tegne verktøytips bakgrunnen ved hjelp av <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.FillRectangle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.FillRectangle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Any custom drawing that is done outside of the rectangle specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.Bounds%2A> property will not show up.
trans-unit.target: En egendefinert tegning som gjøres utenfor rektangelet angitt av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.Bounds%2A>egenskapen ikke vises. du</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.Bounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can increase the bounds of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> before it is shown by handling the `ToolTip.Popup` event.
trans-unit.target: Du kan øke grensene for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>før den vises ved behandling av `ToolTip.Popup` hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs> class also provides the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawText%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBorder%2A> methods to draw individual parts of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> in the standard way used by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs>klassen gir deg også den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawText%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBorder%2A>metoder for å tegne individuelle deler av det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>i standardmetoden brukes av operativsystemet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBorder%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: You can use these methods, together with the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object methods, to make some parts of your ToolTip standard, while customizing other parts.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke disse metodene, sammen med den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objekt metoder for å gjøre deler av din verktøytips standard, under tilpasse andre deler.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> on which to draw the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> å tegne den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the text for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref> that is being drawn.
trans-unit.target: Henter teksten for det <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"> </xref> som det tegnes.

trans-unit.source: Typically you would use the ToolTipText property to determine what the ToolTip text is when you are custom drawing your ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis bruker du egenskapen ToolTipText som bestemme hva Verktøytipsteksten som når du er egendefinerte tegning din verktøytips.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to customize the drawing of the ToolTip text.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode for å tilpasse tegning av teksten for verktøytipset.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you want to have the ToolTip text drawn using the system specified style, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawText%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha Verktøytipsteksten tegnes med det angitte systemet style ved å bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawText%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The text value comes from the value passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.SetToolTip%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> class.
trans-unit.target: Tekstverdien kommer fra en verdi som er sendt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.SetToolTip%2A>metoden for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>klasse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.SetToolTip%2A>

trans-unit.source: The text that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref> when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw"></xref> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Teksten som er knyttet til den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"> </xref> når den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw"> </xref> inntreffer.
